item.title: Try OpenNIC on U250
item.description: Overview The AMD OpenNIC Project consists of a hardware design (OpenNIC shell) and two software drivers (OpenNIC driver and OpenNIC DPDK). This article is base on open-nic-shell at commit 542a487 and open-nic-driver at commit 2fa9668. Tips on the Hardware Part It’s easy to get an FPGA bitstream by following the README. There are two QSFP28 interfaces on the Alveo U250 Data Center Accelerator Card. But the shell enables only one of them by default. Thus, if both of them are needed, do set the parameter -num_cmac_port to 2.
